text: The Latin Wikipedia ( or ) is the Latin language edition of Wikipedia. Started in May 2002, this edition has articles as of .Specialis:Census from the Latin Wikipedia As of April 2024, it is the 66th largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved 23 April 2024. Vicipaedia is the largest Wikipedia in a dead language (a language that is no longer anyone's mother tongue). == References == == Other websites == * Latin Wikipedia's Main page * "Veni Vidi Wiki: Latin Isn't Dead On Vicipaedia" (from The Wall Street Journal, 29 September 2007) * "In praise of . . . Latin" (from The Guardian, 3 October 2007) Category:Wikipedias
title: Latin Wikipedia
